name: My Computer Wants To Eat Me?
name_original: My Computer Wants To Eat Me?
description:
hunt disks in your dreams for a hungry computer

controls :

mouse : camera

movement : wasd, arrow keys

run : shift

action : z,  enter, space

cancel/menu : x , esc

camera : c

take photos of your experience anytime with the c button. open main folder then folder named www then screenshots your pictures will be stored there. 

post game screenshots in this comment section, please and thank you.
